Serialized Form

Package <Unnamed>

Class BackgroundPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

background

Image background
The image to be used for the animated road background.

frame

int frame
The current animation frame.

lanesVisible

boolean lanesVisible
Whether the lanes are visible or not.

Class ButtonPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

gameRef

Driver gameRef
A pointer to the Driver class.

btnNewGame

JButton btnNewGame
New Game button instance to start new games.

btnLanes

JButton btnLanes
Show/Hide lanes button to show/hide lanes.

btnPause

JButton btnPause
Pause button to pause the game.

btnQuit

JButton btnQuit
Quit button to quit the game.

Class Car extends JComponent implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

WIDTH

int WIDTH
Constant width defined for the car.

HEIGHT

int HEIGHT
Constant height defined for the car.

lane

int lane
The lane for the car to drive in.

carType

int carType
The type of car; determines colour, speed, and point value

active

boolean active
For non-player cars this defines whether they can move and allows them to be collided with; for player cars, it just defines if they can be collided with.

colours

boolean colours
Whether or not the car changes colours randomly.

randomColor

Color randomColor
The current random colour. It is needed so that it only changes on the timer

boring

boolean boring
Whether or not the cars are sprites or simple boring blocks.

gpanelRef

GamePanel gpanelRef
A reference to the game panel.

Class GamePanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

WIDTH

int WIDTH
Width of the game panel.

HEIGHT

int HEIGHT
Height of the game panel.

LANES

int LANES
The number of car lanes to have in the game. (14 so that there will always be at least one empty lane)

background

BackgroundPanel background
An animated road background.

gameRef

Driver gameRef
A pointer to the Driver class.

cars

Car[] cars
An array to hold the car instances.

player

Car player
The player's car.

playerMove

boolean playerMove
Whether dragging the mouse will result in the player moving.

difficulty

int difficulty
the current difficulty level

activeCars

int activeCars
number of currently active cars

pause

boolean pause
whether the game is currently paused.

timer

Timer timer
The timer instance that is used to control animation and update the game.

killablecars

boolean killablecars
When true killablecars makes it so that clicking on cars will remove them.

carSprites

Image[] carSprites
An array that can hold all of the sprites that are shown for cheats.

Class LabelPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

lblDodged

JLabel lblDodged
Label showing how many cars have been dodged.

lblCrashes

JLabel lblCrashes
Label showing how many car crashes have occured.

lblTotalScore

JLabel lblTotalScore
Label showing the total score.

dodged

int dodged
The number of cars that have been dodged.

crashes

int crashes
The number of crashes that have occured.

totalscore

int totalscore
The total score of the player.
